effect.tipsylib.vulnerability.descriptio: Reduces the armor points of the user.
effect.tipsylib.health_reduction.descrip: Reduces the health points of the user.
effect.tipsylib.tough_skin.description: The user of the effect no longer takes knockback and is immune to explosion damage.
effect.tipsylib.fast_falling.description: Decreases the jump height of the user.
effect.tipsylib.drowsy.description: Locks the current time of all potion effects the user has.
effect.tipsylib.bleeding.description: The user no longer has any means of regenerating health points.
effect.tipsylib.building_fatigue.descrip: The user can no longer build or destroy any blocks.
effect.tipsylib.true_invisibility.descri: Similar to invisibility but particles and armor do not appear.
effect.tipsylib.fire_skin.description: Attackers of the user with this effect applied burn for a short time.
effect.tipsylib.trail_blazing.descriptio: When the user walks a trail of fire follows behind and has a built in fire resistance.
effect.tipsylib.water_walking.descriptio: The user with this applied can walk on water.
effect.tipsylib.pyromaniac.description: When the user is inside of fire they regenerate health at a rapid rate.
effect.tipsylib.hyper_elasticity.descrip: When the user of the effect falls from a height they bounce back upwards and take decreased fall damage.
effect.tipsylib.enigma.description: Mobs cannot see the user with this effect applied.
effect.tipsylib.steel_feet.description: Removes fall damage for the user with this effect applied.
effect.tipsylib.lava_walking.description: The user with this applied can walk on lava... just make sure to bring fire resistance.
effect.tipsylib.lesser_damage_boost.desc: Slightly increases attack damage of the user.
effect.tipsylib.lesser_weakness.descript: Slightly decreases attack damage of the user.
effect.tipsylib.perception.description: All living entities in a small radius of the user are inflicted with glowing including the user.
effect.tipsylib.gravity_resistance.descr: The effected entity will be immune to obtaining slow falling, fast falling, and levitation.
